name: Vox Machinae
summary:
ABOUT THE GAME
Strap into the pilot seat of a gigantic fighting machine to defend your company's resources from enemies across the galaxy. Select your Grinder chassis and customize it with an arsenal of lasers, missiles, cannons and more as you’re pitted against rival Grinder squads in seamless multiplayer action.

FEATURES 
A weighty tactical simulator mixed with responsive physics-based action. 
Experience an epic, interplanetary single player campaign alongside a ragtag crew of endearing misfits....
